title: Sr Android Developer NEW!
full_description: Greetings From Kairos Technologies...!!!   Position: Sr Android Developer  Location: Remote Duration: 6-12 plus months CTH  Must needed Skills:  Must have great communication skills 8 plus years of Android Development 5 plus years of Kotlin Must have RoomDB, Call Returns, in-Line Data experience and listed on the resume. Must have Excellent communication skill and must be able to have a conversation outside of technology… Regards Kalyan | Lead Executive-TAG | Kairos Technologies Inc.D: 972-430-7731 | O: 972.366.7688 x 317 | E: kalyan@kairostech.com
